abstract: Chery Automobile, the largest independent auto maker in China, is once more preparing for an initial public offering as stock markets improve, Jin Yibo, a company spokesman, told Dow Jones Newswires on Tuesday.
snippet: Chery Automobile, the largest independent auto maker in China, is once more preparing for an initial public offering as stock markets improve, Jin Yibo, a company spokesman, told Dow Jones Newswires on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Chery Automobile, the largest independent automaker in China, is again preparing for an initial public offering as stock markets improve, Jin Yibo, a company spokesman, told Dow Jones Newswires on Tuesday.

headline.main: Chery Automobile Said to Revive I.P.O. Plans
